content: We're going to continue to create awareness among surgeons and train our sales force about how to talk not only the clinical benefits of custom knee, but also the new business model and the financial aspects that we think are particularly intriguing to the AC. So we'll just continue to monitor that and do what's appropriate and make sure that in this environment, it's to make sure we -- we don't overhire so we look at things like employment freezes and stuff like that, no job gets approved without new hire gets approved without Bob and myself personally looking at it, we scrutinize things.
